p: For the in silico, absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion (ADME) analysis, the four natural M. dioica metabolites Catechin, Quercetin, Hederagenin and Oleanolic acid were submitted to and screened using the Swiss ADME tool (Daina et al., 2017) to predict their overall pharmacokinetic profile and drug-likeness ability based on the Lipinski’s Rule of Five. This rule majorly focuses the molecular weight, lipophilicity and the presence of number of hydrogen bond donors and acceptors in the compound ( Table 2) (Quimque et al., 2020).
